Title: Big Trouble in Little Sanchez
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Alex Rubens, Mike McMahan (story editor), David Phillips (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Brian Wysol (story editor), Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick joins in on some hijinks by transferring his consciousness into teenage "Tiny Rick." Beth and Jerry sort out their relationship.
